decision_conditions: Due to the submission of inconsistent and contradictory plans Officers are unable to fully assess the impact of the proposed development on the character appearance of the host dwelling or the immediate surrounding area. The applicant has therefore failed to demonstrate, through the submission of cogent information, that the proposed development would not have an unacceptable adverse impact  in terms of character and appearance, in conflict with Policy D3 of the London Plan (20210 and Policies CS8  and DM10 of the Core Strategy (2012).

The proposed development by reason of its scale, siting  and design would fail to appear to be subordinate  or proportionate to the host dwelling  resulting in an unacceptable harm to the character and appearance of the host dwelling and the surrounding area. The proposal is therefore contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan and Policy CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012 and the Residential Design SPD (2013)
description: (Retrospective) Demolition of an existing detached garage and erection of a single storey rear outbuilding.
